title: Mirror of Germany. No. 122 = Deutschland Spiegel

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Heads of state
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Emperor Hailie Selassie of Ethiopia visits Addis Ababa for talks with Federal German President Dr Lubke; Konrad Adenauer made a member of the Academy of Spiritual and Political Sciences by the "Institut de France"; aged East Germans allowed to visit their relations in West Germany; training school established at Osnabruck for farmers; a great modern market for fruit and vegetable built at Hamburg.
